body.title: Invalid request body payload
body.detail: Your request body is not valid: [{"path":["body"],"code":"required","message":"should have required property 'name'","severity":0},{"path":["body"],"code":"required","message":"should have required property 'photoUrls'","severity":0},{"path":["body","status"],"code":"enum","message":"should be equal to one of the allowed values","severity":0}]
